About_me: Currently works as a Rotating Equipment(RE) Engineer in the Integrated Gas Asset Support team in P&T Rijswijk.  Previous work experience: Shell SmartConnect: support Assets remotely (QSGTL, UK North Sea Assests such as Pierce, Gannet, Nelson, Curlew etc) in the remote monitoring team, providing equipment health evaluatation, condition monitoring, trouble shooting and mitigation plans. Pearl QSGTL MTA 2016: Provide turnaround support for major RE in LPU unit. Nederlandse Aardolie Maatschappij (NAM), Groningen Projects Department : Projects, Start up and Commissioning, Development Release. New Orleans Refinery Company (Norco) : RE in unit/operation support, condition monitoring and maintenance and repair scope of equipment. Shell P&T Malaysia: REE supporting downstream assets, the focal point for Smart Connect deployment in the Asia region. Eunice graduated from Imperial College London with a Masters in Mechanical Engineering and is currently a certified engineer with accreditation from the Institute of Mechanical Engineers (IMechE). She is also an assessed TA3 in the RE Skillpool.
Ask_me_about: Equipment remote monitoring and Development Release.
Name: Doe, Jane 15
Role_Description_1: Provided technical assurance (TA3) and execution support of Major Turnaround activities in LPU unit – Overhaul and repairs of centrifugal compressors, forced, induced draft fans and pumps.
Role_Description_2: Provide remote support to assets for equipment health monitoring to Qatar Pearl (QSGTL) and Shell UK North Sea assets – Gannet, Shearwater, Curlew, Nelson and Pierce.
Role_Description_3: Management of Technology Maturation Plan- Start up and commissioning of gas cluster (Groningen
Role_Description_4: Responsible for unit support through daily run and maintain activities and troubleshooting.• Participation in unit production teams, investigations and proposing long term solutions for Bad Actor equipment.
